name: Jemimah

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

aboutpara: Hi there, I'm a junior front end web developer with a passion for problem solving and a strong desire to work for a firm that uses technology to tackle modern challenges. I'm excited to work with software and have a basic understanding of HTML, CSS, JQuery, and MySQL. I'm confident in my English skills and have excellent teamwork abilities. I'm always willing to learn new technologies and am self-motivated to complete tasks regardless of external rewards. I believe my growth mindset and grit make me an excellent candidate for this role, and I'm eager to excel and grow as a member of your team.
